mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.title AS "title", a.logo AS "logo", a.domain AS "domain", a.description AS "description", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.theme AS "theme", a.copyright AS "copyright", a.custom_index_view AS "customIndexView", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.rmk AS "rmk", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMS_SITE( id, name, title, logo, domain, description, keywords, theme, copyright, custom_index_view, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, rmk, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{title}, #{logo}, null, #{description}, #{keywords}, #{theme}, #{copyright}, #{customIndexView}, #{createBy.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateTime}, #{rmk}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CMS_SITE SET name = #{name}, title = #{title}, logo = #{logo}, domain = #{domain}, description = #{description}, keywords = #{keywords}, theme = #{theme}, copyright = #{copyright}, custom_index_view = #{customIndexView}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateTime}, rmk = #{rmk}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
